caption.title: Optimization of the multiplex influenza A/B LAMP primer set.
caption.p: (A) Different concentration ratios of the influenza A, influenza B, and internal control primer sets (1:1:1, 1:1:0.5, and 1:0.5:0.5, respectively) for human serum RNA (HS RNA) samples spiked with influenza A and B plasmids. (B) Temperature gradient tests (58–65°C) of the multiplex influenza A/B/IC LAMP assay. (C) Performance of the multiplex influenza A/B/IC LAMP assay against HS RNA spiked with influenza A plasmid, HS RNA spiked with influenza B plasmid, and HS RNA spiked with influenza A/B plasmid (1:1).
